name: 活动扩展系统查询模板字典
description: 活动安排、活动海报、活动资源、活动人员、活动模板等活动扩展系统相关表的查询模板

活动安排总数.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM activity_arrangements

安排状态统计.sql: SELECT arrangement_status, COUNT(*) as count FROM activity_arrangements GROUP BY arrangement_status ORDER BY count DESC
安排状态统计.description: 统计活动安排状态分布
安排状态统计.response: 活动安排状态统计完成

本月活动安排.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM activity_arrangements WHERE YEAR(arrangement_date) = YEAR(NOW()) AND MONTH(arrangement_date) = MONTH(NOW())
本月活动安排.description: 查询本月活动安排数量

活动类型安排统计.sql: SELECT activity_type, COUNT(*) as count FROM activity_arrangements GROUP BY activity_type ORDER BY count DESC
活动类型安排统计.description: 统计活动类型安排分布
活动类型安排统计.response: 活动类型安排统计完成

活动海报总数.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM activity_posters

海报状态统计.sql: SELECT poster_status, COUNT(*) as count FROM activity_posters GROUP BY poster_status ORDER BY count DESC

海报类型统计.sql: SELECT poster_type, COUNT(*) as count FROM activity_posters GROUP BY poster_type ORDER BY count DESC

本月新增海报.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM activity_posters WHERE YEAR(created_at) = YEAR(NOW()) AND MONTH(created_at) = MONTH(NOW())
本月新增海报.description: 查询本月新增海报数量

活动资源总数.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM activity_resources

资源类型统计.sql: SELECT resource_type, COUNT(*) as count FROM activity_resources GROUP BY resource_type ORDER BY count DESC

资源状态统计.sql: SELECT resource_status, COUNT(*) as count FROM activity_resources GROUP BY resource_status ORDER BY count DESC

可用资源统计.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM activity_resources WHERE resource_status = 'available'

活动人员总数.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM activity_staffs

人员角色统计.sql: SELECT staff_role, COUNT(*) as count FROM activity_staffs GROUP BY staff_role ORDER BY count DESC

人员状态统计.sql: SELECT staff_status, COUNT(*) as count FROM activity_staffs GROUP BY staff_status ORDER BY count DESC

确认参与人员.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM activity_staffs WHERE staff_status = 'confirmed'
确认参与人员.description: 查询确认参与人员数量

活动模板总数.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM activity_templates

模板分类统计.sql: SELECT template_category, COUNT(*) as count FROM activity_templates GROUP BY template_category ORDER BY count DESC

模板状态统计.sql: SELECT template_status, COUNT(*) as count FROM activity_templates GROUP BY template_status ORDER BY count DESC

活跃模板统计.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM activity_templates WHERE template_status = 'active'

模板使用统计.sql: SELECT template_name, usage_count FROM activity_templates ORDER BY usage_count DESC LIMIT 10

活动扩展系统概览.sql: SELECT 'activity_arrangements' as category, COUNT(*) as count FROM activity_arrangements UNION ALL SELECT 'activity_posters' as category, COUNT(*) as count FROM activity_posters UNION ALL SELECT 'activity_resources' as category, COUNT(*) as count FROM activity_resources UNION ALL SELECT 'activity_staffs' as category, COUNT(*) as count FROM activity_staffs UNION ALL SELECT 'activity_templates' as category, COUNT(*) as count FROM activity_templates
活动扩展系统概览.description: 活动扩展系统数据总览
活动扩展系统概览.response: 活动扩展系统概览查询完成

活动资源配置分析.sql: SELECT aa.activity_type, COUNT(ar.id) as resource_count, COUNT(as.id) as staff_count FROM activity_arrangements aa LEFT JOIN activity_resources ar ON aa.activity_id = ar.activity_id LEFT JOIN activity_staffs as ON aa.activity_id = as.activity_id GROUP BY aa.activity_type ORDER BY resource_count DESC
活动资源配置分析.description: 分析活动资源配置情况
活动资源配置分析.response: 活动资源配置分析完成
